name: sharespace-backend
description: ShareSpace - Node.js Lambda functions and shared utilities

scripts.build: node scripts/prepare-lambda-deps.js && tsc && npm run copy:deps
scripts.copy:deps: mkdir -p dist/node_modules && rsync -a --exclude='sharespace-infrastructure' --exclude='sharespace-backend' --exclude='sharespace' ../node_modules/ dist/node_modules/ && [ -d node_modules ] && cp -r node_modules/* dist/node_modules/ || true
scripts.build:lambda:health: npm run build && node scripts/bundle-lambda.js health
scripts.build:lambda:auth: npm run build && node scripts/bundle-lambda.js auth
scripts.build:lambda:media: npm run build && node scripts/bundle-lambda.js media
scripts.build:lambda:user: npm run build && node scripts/bundle-lambda.js user
